learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of MPP databases
Apply MPP databases in practical scenarios
sections.background: Data is partitioned across multiple servers or nodes with each server/node having memory/processors to process data locally. All communication is via a network interconnect — there is no disk-level sharing or contention to be concerned with (i.e. it is a ‘shared-nothing’ architecture).

metadata.concept_definition: Data is partitioned across multiple servers or nodes with each server/node having memory/processors to process data locally. All communication is via a network interconnect — there is no disk-level sharing or contention to be concerned with (i.e. it is a ‘shared-nothing’ architecture).
